title: Our Thing Season 2 - Episode 7 "The Off The Record Hit"
description: The critically acclaimed podcast returns for a second season. Directed by: James Carroll. In this episode Sammy tells the story of a hit that put him and his entire crew in jeopardy.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: The critically acclaimed podcast returns for a second season. Directed by: James Carroll. In this episode Sammy tells the story of a hit that put him and his entire crew in jeopardy.
